oneshotai.title: OneShotAI
oneshotai.description: Take a Photo, Smart Analysis, Instant Understanding.

promptpal.title: PromptPal
promptpal.description: Save, organize, and access your AI prompts anywhere. The perfect companion for your AI productivity workflow.

githubseek.title: Github Seek
githubseek.description: Locate massive GitHub collections in seconds, AI-powered search made effortlessly simple.

asst-ai.title: Asst AI
asst-ai.description: A smart assistant focused on single AI text generation. Multi-model support and built-in prompt management, making your AI workflow smoother.

text2image.title: Byte Text Image Generator
text2image.description: A modern text-to-image generation tool with multiple templates and styles. Built using Next.js 14 and TypeScript, supporting dark mode and i18n.

tool-site.title: Byte Tools Navigation Site
tool-site.description: A navigation website featuring hundreds of practical tools from China and abroad, including efficiency tools, AI tools, learning tools, development tools, audio resources, video resources, design tools, and creative tools.

Sponsor.heading: Support My Work
Sponsor.description: I sincerely thank the wonderful people who support my open source work. Your support helps me continue creating and maintaining open source projects.
